name: Bull Horn Jewelry
description:
This product is totally unique because it is made of real bull horn which shows its natural color in every bracelet, so you wont ever find 2 alike!! 
No animals are harmed to elaborate this product, we use the horns that are cut on farms for security reasons! we love animals! :)

name: Organic Nail File
description:
These natural nail files are made from scales of the gigantic Paiche fish from the waters of the Amazon Peruvian jungle. The scales are obtained from fish cultivated in a stanch for meat, we have found a new use for something that was once waste material and we have transformed it, after a careful process of selection and cleaning, into a new product, original and useful.

This natural nail file has all the properties of a conventional nail file plus a series of additional advantages:

-100% ecological because it is totally organic. 
- Resistant to wear and breakage because of its’ flexibility.
- Durable 
- Safe to use because it has no sharp edges. 
- It fortifies the nails because of its’ delicate very fine grain. 
- Easy to use because of its’ curved and anatomical form.

name: Handmade belt with natural wool
description:
This product is a totally unique design by Altipana.

Natural wool and the talented hands of artisans mix to create a unique, one of a kind belt. Two days are spent to handmade a single one.
Properties:

-One exclusive design for each belt.
- Washables.
- Adjustable.
- 100% Handmade.
- Ecologic product because of its material: Natural sheep wool. 
- Most of the colors from the sheep wool are dyed naturally.
